MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Ann Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 7:34PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11PM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.49PM on Sunday 17th January 2021.
